Text:
??? Why the fuck are you advertising here at The Pirat Bay for your torrent webpage/tracker...???
The majority in here i think is from skandinavia (and nearby) who will never learn or try to learn the language your torrent page is written in.
(when advertising a produkt, it would be wise to make sure that the produkt you are advertising for are beeing presented in a form that the majority would be able to  read/understand.)

Hope you stop advertising for your tracker in the way you now are doing...!!!
